attributes.action: Legislate to prevent politicians in a EU pension plan voting on Brexit matters.
attributes.additional_details:
Below is a link to an article in the Express from their Brussels correspondent. It is in the public domain and raises interesting points, with reference to EU pensions.

https://www.express.co.uk/news/politics/997647/Lord-Mandelson-brexit-EU-loyalty-pension-retirement-fund
attributes.background: If a politician is going to benefit financially from a EU pension, then there can arise a conflict of interest. EU Commissioners and officials,  in our House of Lords receive an EU pension with a restriction they should not criticise the EU.This should be declared as a potential conflict of interest
